verses.verse: Now this is the history of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> and of Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth. <S%H3315><s%> Sons <S%H1121><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to them after <S%H310><s%> the flood. <S%H3999><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Japheth: <S%H3315><s%> Gomer, <S%H1586><s%> Magog, <S%H4031><s%> Madai, <S%H4074><s%> Javan, <S%H3120><s%> Tubal, <S%H8422><s%> Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> and Tiras. <S%H8494><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gomer: <S%H1586><s%> Ashkenaz, <S%H813><s%> Riphath, <S%H7384><s%> and Togarmah. <S%H8425><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Javan: <S%H3120><s%> Elishah, <S%H473><s%> Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> Kittim, <S%H3794><s%> and Dodanim. <S%H1721><s%>

Of these were the islands <S%H339><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> divided in <S%H6504><s%> their lands, <S%H776><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> after his language, <S%H3956><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> in their nations. <S%H1471><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ham: <S%H2526><s%> Cush, <S%H3568><s%> Mizraim, <S%H4714><s%> Put, <S%H6316><s%> and Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Cush: <S%H3568><s%> Seba, <S%H5434><s%> Havilah, <S%H2341><s%> Sabtah, <S%H5454><s%> Raamah, <S%H7484><s%> and Sabteca. <S%H5455><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Raamah: <S%H7484><s%> Sheba <S%H7614><s%> and Dedan. <S%H1719><s%>
Cush <S%H3568><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nimrod. <S%H5248><s%> He began <S%H2490><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> a mighty one <S%H1368><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

He was a mighty <S%H1368><s%> hunter <S%H6718><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Therefore <S%H3651><s%> it is said, <S%H559><s%> "Like Nimrod, <S%H5248><s%> a mighty <S%H1368><s%> hunter <S%H6718><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"
The beginning <S%H7225><s%> of his kingdom <S%H4467><s%> was Babel, <S%H894><s%> Erech, <S%H751><s%> Accad, <S%H390><s%> and Calneh, <S%H3641><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar. <S%H8152><s%>
Out of that land <S%H776><s%> he went <S%H3318><s%> into Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> Nineveh, <S%H5210><s%> Rehoboth <S%H7344><s%>- Ir, <S%H5892><s%> Calah, <S%H3625><s%>
and Resen <S%H7449><s%> between Nineveh <S%H5210><s%> and Calah <S%H3625><s%> (the same is the great <S%H1419><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>).
Mizraim <S%H4714><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ludim, <S%H3866><s%> Anamim, <S%H6047><s%> Lehabim, <S%H3853><s%> Naphtuhim, <S%H5320><s%>
Pathrusim, <S%H6625><s%> Casluhim <S%H3695><s%> (which the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> descended <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H3732><s%>), and Caphtorim.
Canaan <S%H3667><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Sidon <S%H6721><s%> (his firstborn <S%H1060><s%>), Heth, <S%H2845><s%>
the Jebusite, <S%H2983><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Girgashite, <S%H1622><s%>
the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> the Arkite, <S%H6208><s%> the Sinite, <S%H5513><s%>

the Arvadite, <S%H721><s%> the Zemarite, <S%H6786><s%> and the Hamathite. <S%H2577><s%> Afterward <S%H310><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> were spread abroad. <S%H6327><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> was from Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> as you go <S%H935><s%> toward Gerar, <S%H1642><s%> to Gaza; <S%H5804><s%> as you go <S%H935><s%> toward Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> Admah, <S%H126><s%> and Zeboiim, <S%H6636><s%> to Lasha. <S%H3962><s%>
These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ham, <S%H2526><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> after their languages, <S%H3956><s%> in their lands, <S%H776><s%> in their nations. <S%H1471><s%>

To Shem, <S%H8035><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of all the children of Eber, <S%H5677><s%> the elder <S%H1419><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> of <S%H1419><s%> Japheth, <S%H3315><s%> to him also were children born. <S%H3205><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shem: <S%H8035><s%> Elam, <S%H5867><s%> Asshur, <S%H804><s%> Arpachshad, <S%H775><s%> Lud, <S%H3865><s%> and Aram. <S%H758><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aram: <S%H758><s%> Uz, <S%H5780><s%> Hul, <S%H2343><s%> Gether, <S%H1666><s%> and Mash. <S%H4851><s%>
Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shelah. <S%H7974><s%> Shelah <S%H7974><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Eber. <S%H5677><s%>

To Eber <S%H5677><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%> The name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Peleg, <S%H6389><s%> for in his days <S%H3117><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> was divided. <S%H6385><s%> His brother <S%H251><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> was Joktan. <S%H3355><s%>
Joktan <S%H3355><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Almodad, <S%H486><s%> Sheleph, <S%H8026><s%> Hazarmaveth, <S%H2700><s%> Jerah, <S%H3392><s%>
Hadoram, <S%H1913><s%> Uzal, <S%H187><s%> Diklah, <S%H1853><s%>
Obal, <S%H5745><s%> Abimael, <S%H39><s%> Sheba, <S%H7614><s%>
Ophir, <S%H211><s%> Havilah, <S%H2341><s%> and Jobab. <S%H3103><s%> All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joktan. <S%H3355><s%>
Their dwelling <S%H4186><s%> was from Mesha, <S%H4852><s%> as you go <S%H935><s%> toward Sephar, <S%H5611><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the east. <S%H6924><s%>
These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shem, <S%H8035><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> after their languages, <S%H3956><s%> in their lands, <S%H776><s%> after their nations. <S%H1471><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah, <S%H5146><s%> after their generations, <S%H8435><s%> in their nations. <S%H1471><s%> Of these were the nations <S%H1471><s%> divided <S%H6504><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood. <S%H3999><s%>
